Text: Hey marco... if you're gonna contribute to the community, please at least follow the basic ground rules... The most important of which is putting "FS2004" and/or "FSX" at the beginning of the description. If it's for FSX, put that. If it's for FS2004, put that. If it's for both, put both. If it's for X-Plane, put "X-Plane". Get it? That way people can find what they're looking for by using the search function.
Well, Seegs108... Marco_123... same difference. lol
This plane is available as a freeware download on the alphasim site.
